DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy Restasis® participant dry eye disease engage electronic visual tasking .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Maintaining Visual Performance Participants Who Engage Electronic Visual Tasking While Using Restasis®
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Has Eye Symptoms use video display terminal Has report history dry eye eye . Exclusion : Diagnosed eye infection active inflammation . Has wear contact lens within past 7 day anticipate use study . Has use eye drop within 2 hour . Has laserassisted situ keratomileusis ( LASIK ) within 12 month . Has use Restasis® within 90 day . Has eye or/lid surgery within 6 month . Has cataract surgery either eye . Has current punctal occlusion anticipate change punctal occlusion status point study . Is currently take topical ophthalmic prescription overthecounter solution , artificial tear , gel lid scrubs discontinue trial duration . Use medication know cause ocular dry stable dose least 30 day .
